overview: Lia lives with her no-good boyfriend. They live in a small apartment and on this very hot summer day the air conditioner goes down, the power goes out, the plumbing goes bad. Lia gets so hot and bothered by all the problems she decides to leave her boyfriend. But before she does that, she watches and partakes in a lot of wet and sweaty sex.
tagline: Get soaked with Lia and her bouncy friends
title: Wet Sweaty Boobs
